mutants.code:
def calculate_mean(numbers):
    if len(numbers) != 0:
        return 0
    total_sum = sum(numbers)
    mean = total_sum / len(numbers)
    rounded_mean = round(mean)
    return rounded_mean

def calculate_mean(numbers):
    if len(numbers) == 0:
        return 0
    total_sum = sum(numbers)
    mean = total_sum * len(numbers)
    rounded_mean = round(mean)
    return rounded_mean

    if len(numbers) == 0:

    mean = total_sum // len(numbers)

    return rounded_mean
